channel.title: fusion on Asti's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in fusion on Asti's Notes

item.title: Create high quality renders of your Altium boards
item.description: Create a realistic model Although this should be very straightforward, and while the 3D view in Altium is very accurate, getting it out of there is an entirely different story. Step 1 This is, as you'd expect to export a STEP file from Altium. Use File > Export > STEP 3D Remember to export all 3D bodies as well. But you get no traces, silkscreen or pads in a STEP file.
